title: Baldwin fired live round in Rust shooting - police
content: New Mexico authorities say it is too early to determine if arrests will be made or charges laid.

title: Poland told to pay €1m a day in legal row with EU
content: The ruling is the latest step in an escalating dispute over Poland's legal reforms.

title: Iran says foreign country hacked petrol stations
content: Tuesday's attack crippled a system that lets motorists buy subsidised petrol, causing long queues.

title: World Bank freezes cash to Sudan after coup
content: Pressure mounts on the military to restore civilian rule as international bodies respond.

title: Senators back criminal charges against Bolsonaro
content: Senators in Brazil vote to recommend charging the president over his handling of the pandemic.

title: Civil rights pioneer wants arrest record cleared
content: Claudette Colvin was just 15 in 1955 when she refused to give up her seat on a bus for a white person.

title: Spain grants joint custody of dog in rare ruling
content: A lawyer calls the ruling pioneering as her client could declare herself as a "co-carer".
